name: Reality Shifter
description:
As he regained his consciousness, Grey found himself in a strange world, where objects can be Real or UnReal. Follow his adventure, as he overcome the obstacles and try to escape the strange Reality Dimension, using a newfound ability known as Reality Shifting. Shift the reality state of objects in various clever ways to overcome the challenges of the world in this puzzle platformer.

This game was made for 2022 Brackeys Game Jam, but due to technical issues of building with Unity on Apple Silicon's Mac, it was not successfully submitted in time. Therefore I've decided to polish it further into a minimum viable product and publish it. This is the first MVP (and completed game project) in my game development journey, so any feedbacks, suggestions or advices and very much welcomed. With that said, I hope that you will enjoy the game as much as I enjoy making it.

The recommended aspect ratio of display for best experience is 16:9 (for example: display resolution of 1920x1080) as there might be some issues on in-game objects placement if display with different aspect ratio is used. I am currently working on aspect ratio enforcing feature and will release a new version of the game once it is done.
